title: I Go Dye
text: He is a motivational speaker, writer and social crusader. However, through his artistry he has continued to promote global peace and child welfare.

title: History of education in the United States
text: 30 states with compulsory schooling laws required attendance until age 14 (or higher). As a result, by 1910, 72 percent of American children attended school.

title: Mussoorie
text: In Mussoorie Nagar Palika Parishad, female sex ratio is of 812 against state average of 963. Moreover, child sex ratio in Mussoorie is around 918 compared to Uttarakhand state average of 890.

title: Glenamaddy GAA
text: The club is a member of the Galway GAA. Glenamaddy compete in the Galway Intermediate Football Championship yet they have not won the competition in their history.

title: Eritrea
text: The nation has no official language, as the Constitution establishes the "equality of all Eritrean languages". However, Tigrinya serves as the de facto language of national identity.

title: Love Survives (album)
text: "Love Survives" was not released on the Double Deal Brand Records Label. Instead it was released in June 2007 by the band for free download on the internet with a higher quality CD available for purchase.

title: Hart of Dixie
text: In Season 2, she begins dating Wade. However, he ends up cheating on her when he loses Battle of the Bands, and she ends their relationship.
